Putin's interview with his fawning stooge Tucker Carlson was straight out of Hitler's playbook.  I pray Americans see through this unholy charade  —  When Tucker Carlson went to the Kremlin he had a function well known to history.  He was to be the stooge of the tyrant, the dictaphone to the dictator and a traitor to journalism.
